    • setUSER_PATH

      public void setUSER_PATH(String username)
      sets the USER_PATH so firebase directs to the correct list of items
      Parameters:
      username - the string that tells firebase who the user is Should be set everytime the user logs in to the app

    • DocumentRef

      public com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference DocumentRef(long ID)
      creates a document of firebase for storing the information in an item returns the document if it already exists
      Parameters:
      ID - the name of the item on firebase, generated using UTC
      Returns:
      DocumentReference

    • DocumentRef

      public com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference DocumentRef(Item item)
      an alternative method of making a document reference where the item is given and the Id is taken from there + faster to code
      Parameters:
      item - an item to get the firebase document for
      Returns:
      DocumentReference

    • setPhoto

      public void setPhoto(long id, android.graphics.Bitmap photo, String name)
      Uploads a photo for a specific item to firebase, using the id, photo_id and the file
      Parameters:
      id - id of the item to assign the photo to
      photo - the actual photo to be assigned
      name - the name for the photo, generated when it was captured/selected
